name: 战地指挥官/Battleboom
description:
"Battleboom" is a fair battle game with military theme.You will play the role of a commander to deploy and command your team. And you need to master the characteristics of each unit, find different strategic combinations you like and are good at, try your best to destroy the other player's effective forces, and finally destroy the enemy's base to win! come and battle!



1. Instant action, Site decision
The game adopts the Instant action mode. The position, timing of each unit, the enemy and battlefield environment, each unit will determine the final outcome . Being fully familiar with each unit in the formation and choosing different strategies according to the opponent is the key to victory.



2. Multiple combinations, Ever-changing
Which one do you like, crowd flow, machinery flow, construction flow, barracks flow and control flow? The change of a card can determine the direction of the battlefield, and the targeted layout and selection can often get twice the result with half the effort.



3. Join the Legion, Be stronger
Join the Legion! There are not only more rewards and more partners, but also sharing card groups and exchanging combat experience. At the same time, the small partners of the Legion can also exchange the units they want with you, optimize your formation, and cooperation will make you stronger.



4. Various modes,Up to you
The game provides a variety of battle modes, including intense and exciting 1v1 competition, cooperative 2v2 battle, competition between friends, and self challenging encounter (a variety of playing methods, such as time limited challenge, defensive challenge, etc.), there is always one you like.
